protein.specific_function: Calcium-binding protein that may play a role in the adhesion of neutrophils to fibronectin. May play a role in the formation of focal adhesions

reference.reference_text: Boyhan A, Casimir CM, French JK, Teahan CG, Segal AW: Molecular cloning and characterization of grancalcin, a novel EF-hand calcium-binding protein abundant in neutrophils and monocytes. J Biol Chem. 1992 Feb 15;267(5):2928-33.
